about_the_game:
Assemble a new team of Abomis every run from a random pool of hundreds of different monsters to recruit, train, and evolve. Adapt your strategies as your party faces infinite combinations of foes in a turn-based battle system that's easy to learn but holds a lot of depth.

Be careful to protect your Abomis! Losing all of your HP means that your teammates could permanently die, adding high stakes to every battle. If you're hoping for a more relaxing Abomi Nation experience, don't worry! Abomi Nation's customization options allow you to craft the kind of run that suits your needs. Whether you want permadeath turned off, or you like adding chaotic modifiers to crank the difficulty up, Abomi Nation prioritizes letting you play your way.


Plan your path across Abomi Nation's new map system, where you can find new Abomis to recruit, enemies to train against, and all sorts of random events to shape your run. After defeating the boss of each area, return to your home base to recoup and further prepare your team for their next adventure.



Mysterious rifts have been opening up in the skies of Abomi Nation, tearing holes in space and time. Through these rifts, monsters from all sorts of indie game universes are pouring out into Abomi Nation!

You'll find crossover monsters from Bug Fables, Monster Sanctuary, Coromon, Toodee and Topdee, Super Sami Roll, and so many more great indie games! Dozens of crossovers are planned for the full release of Abomi Nation: Monster Rifts, so stay tuned for more announcements in the future.

However, the rifts are slowly eating away at the island of Abomi Nation itself. It's up to you to assemble a team and fight back against the source opening up these rifts in the first place!



Using the in-game Abomi Nation Creation Station, players will be able to create custom Abomis, attacks, items, and biomes, then share their creations with others via Steam Workshop.

Simply upload your sprites, tweak some values like stats and typing, and congratulations! You've created an Abomi of your very own, no coding experience required.

Download other players' creations from Steam Workshop to truly make team combinations infinite.

short_description: Battle teams of Abomis in this turn-based roguelike monster-tamer where the matchups change every run! Recruit creatures from several different indie universes to help close the rifts destroying Abomi Nation. Create your own Abomis or download others from Steam Workshop for infinite possibilities!
